mapper.insert:
insert into dc_sms_log ( user_id, mobile, sms_type, sms_param, message, create_time, update_time, third_channel, paasoo_phone_val_errcode, paasoo_phone_val_format, paasoo_phone_val_str, paasoo_sms_messageid, paasoo_sms_status, paasoo_sms_status_code, paasoo_sms_str ) values
( #{sms.userId}, #{sms.mobile}, #{sms.smsType,}, #{sms.smsParam}, #{sms.message}, #{sms.createTime}, #{sms.updateTime}, #{sms.thirdChannel}, #{sms.paasooPhoneValErrcode}, #{sms.paasooPhoneValFormat}, #{sms.paasooPhoneValStr}, #{sms.paasooSmsMessageid}, #{sms.paasooSmsStatus}, #{sms.paasooSmsStatusCode}, #{sms.paasooSmsStr} )
